caption.p: DPPH scavenging activities of AECR and AECR-AuNPs at various concentrations. The antioxidant potential of aqueous extract of Crassocephalum rubens (AECR) and the corresponding gold nanoparticles (AECR-AuNPs), at different concentrations, were assessed using the DPPH radical scarvenging assay.
Each data is presented as mean ± SD (n = 3). ap < 0.05 compared to quercetin.
